item.description:
Remember The A-Team? The '80s action show with George Peppard, Dirk Benedict, Dwight Schultz, and Mr. T? Those guys aren't in this one. This is the movie version with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper (The Hangover), Sharlto Copley (District 9), and Quinton "Rampage" Jackson (WWE).

The A-Team opens June 11. Let's go to the 7:05 at Showcase in Worcester on Saturday, June 19. We'll meet in the lobby about 1/2 hour before the show - at 6:35.

Anyone who wants to can join me for eats and conversation after the film.

Feel free to call me if you have any questions: 508-981-0455.

Be There!
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear my Superman cap.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The A-Team
